Top-3 Similar Questions: so_25773929: ffmpeg to convert .avi, .mp4, .mp3, .flv, .mkv to mp4
au_657827: Bash script to convert multiple image sequences to video files
so_19562785: HandBrakeCLI bash script convert all videos in a folder
Top-3 Scripts:
so_25773929: for file in *.{flv,avi,mp3,mkv}; do
        target="${file%.*}.mp4"
        [[ -f "$target" ]] && { echo "skipping $file - $target exists" ; continue; }
        echo ffmpeg -r 15  -i "$file"  -b 296k -s 640x320 -vcodec mpeg4 -acodec aac "$target"
done

so_19562785: $ ls test
1.txt  2.txt
$ SRC=test; for f in "`ls $SRC`" ; do echo $f; done
1.txt 2.txt
$ SRC=test; for f in "$SRC"/* ; do echo $f; done
test/1.txt
test/2.txt

$ ls "the test"
1.txt  2.txt
$ SRC="the test"; for f in "$SRC"/* ; do echo $f; done
the test/1.txt
the test/2.txt
